hangle: 너희를 이대로 보내면 내가 공작한테 더러운 꼴을 당해서.
first_translate: if I let you go like this, I’ll be the one who gets in trouble with the duke.
second_translate: If I let you go like this, I'll end up facing disgrace from the duke.
label: well, the duke will give me hell if I just let you go.
hey, boss.
would you like me to...

first_translate: should I cut off what’s between their legs?
second_translate: Cut off what's between their legs?
label: ...cut the things dangling between their legs?
hmm...
no, that won't be necessary.
thank you, miss.

first_translate: we won’t ever act recklessly again.
second_translate: We won’t ever act recklessly again.
label: we'll never step out of line ever again.

first_translate: we’re so glad you forgave us...
second_translate: I'm so relieved that you forgave us...
label: thank you for forgiving us--
who said I forgave you?
aaack!

first_translate: my lady, you should close your eyes.
second_translate: My lady, it's best if you close your eyes.
label: lady eunice, you should close your eyes.
I'll cover your ears.
yes?
ah, all right...
all right, we're ready.

hangle: 자르진 말고, 한 대씩 세게 두들겨 줘.
first_translate: don’t cut it off, but give them a good whack.
second_translate: Don't cut it off, but give them a good whack each.
label: don't cut them off, but give them a good pounding.
will do.
gaah...
but before that,

first_translate: take a good look at my face.
second_translate: Take a good look at my face.
label: I want you both to take a good look at my face.

hangle: 의뢰를 수행할 때, 물지 말아야 할 상대가 누군지는 기억해야지.
first_translate: you should remember who not to bite when you’re carrying out a job.
second_translate: You should remember who you must not bite when carrying out a request.
label: you dogs will have to remember who not to bite when you carry out my orders.
yes...
we’re so sorry...
we won’t forget...

second_translate: I think the lecture is over now.
label: I guess that's all for the sermon,
so...
...it's time for the execution!
aaaaah!!
next.
uuugh!!
this place...

first_translate: ...the place that was swallowed by darkness?
second_translate: Is this a place swallowed by darkness?
label: ...must have been devoured by the darkness.

first_translate: we can’t even recover the bodies...
second_translate: We can't even retrieve the bodies...
label: we can’t even bury the bodies...

first_translate: your highness, what will we do now?
second_translate: your highness, what will you do now?
label: your highness, what will you do now?

first_translate: we’ll use this place as our base...
second_translate: We'll use this place as our base.
label: we'll have to set up base here...

first_translate: ...and start exterminating the monsters in the forest.
second_translate: ...and properly start exterminating the monsters in the forest.
label: ...and start hunting for demonic beasts in the forest.

hangle: 피오나 영애는 아카데미의 연구원들과 있는 게 낫지 않을까.
first_translate: wouldn’t it be better for lady fiona to stay with the academy researchers?
second_translate: Wouldn't it be better for Lady Fiona to stay with the academy researchers?
label: wouldn't it be better for lady fiona to stay with the researchers from the academy?

first_translate: they seem to have a lot of work to do.
second_translate: There seems to be quite a lot of work.
label: it seems like they have a lot of work to do.
hm...

first_translate: he doesn’t want to send me to a dangerous place, huh?
second_translate: He doesn't want to send me to a dangerous place, does he?
label: he’s saying this because he doesn't want to put me in danger, huh?
your highness,

first_translate: we should separate our personal and official duties.
second_translate: We should distinguish between personal matters and official duties.
label: you shouldn’t let your private feelings get in the way of your official duties.

first_translate: this isn’t where I’m supposed to be.
second_translate: This is not where I belong.
label: this is not where I belong.
you know that.
blush
I see my beauty is working like a charm.

hangle: 일단 황제 폐하께 칙령도 받은 몸이니 열심히 일하죠.
first_translate: let’s work hard since we’ve been given an imperial order.
second_translate: Since I have received an imperial decree, I shall work hard.
label: since his majesty has given me direct orders, I should do my best to make myself useful.

first_translate: I’ll just go out for a bit at the start.
second_translate: I'll just go out for a bit at the start.
label: you can come along for a little bit at first.
wow.

hangle: …아벨이 빨리 돌아와서 네 대타가 되어야 하는데.
first_translate: abel needs to come back soon so he can take your place.
second_translate: Abel needs to come back soon so he can be your substitute.
label: I hope abel gets here quickly so he can replace you.

first_translate: you just want to work your master to the bone.
second_translate: You just want to work your master to the bone.
label: look at you trying to make your teacher do all the hard work.
I see you’re both still two peas in a pod.
what in the world would make you say that?

hangle: 이런, 어딜 봐도 어린 시절처럼 다정하신데요.
first_translate: oh my, you’re as close as you were when you were young.
second_translate: Oh my, no matter how you look at it, you're just as affectionate as you were in your childhood.
label: well, you're still just as close as you were when you were kids,

hangle: 겉모습이야 두 분 다 콩나물처럼 쑥쑥 자라셨지만.
first_translate: you’ve both grown like bean sprouts, though.
second_translate: You've both shot up like bean sprouts, though.
label: only now you've both grown like a pair of beanstalks.
oh.
sir knight, you dropped this.
ah, thank you.
is it yours?

first_translate: yes, would you like to see?
second_translate: Yes. Would you like to take a look?
label: yes, would you like to take a look?

first_translate: it’s my wife, who I left at home.
second_translate: It’s my wife, who I left at home.
label: that's my wife who's waiting for me back home.

first_translate: I heard she was pregnant before I left.
second_translate: I heard she was pregnant before I left.
label: I was told she was with child just before I left.
wow!

first_translate: you should have told me sooner!
second_translate: You should've told me that sooner!
label: why didn't you tell us sooner?!

hangle: 제 옆이 아니라 부인 곁에 있어야 되잖아요?!
first_translate: you should be with your wife, not me!
second_translate: You should be with your wife, not me!
label: you should be with your wife, not out here next to me!

first_translate: I can’t help it. it’s my duty.
second_translate: It can't be helped. It's my duty.
label: I can’t help it if it’s my duty.

hangle: 그래도 주군께서 예정일 전에 돌아가게 해 준다고 하셨으니까요.
first_translate: but his highness said I could go back before the due date.
second_translate: But my lord said I could return before the scheduled date.
label: and duke abel has given me permission to go home before the baby is born.

hangle: 아벨, 사람 부려 먹는 게 너무 독해!
first_translate: abel, you’re too ruthless in working people hard!
second_translate: Abel, you're too ruthless in working people hard!
label: abel is always driving his men too hard!
all right.

hangle: 제가 더 빨리 헤일론으로 돌아갈 수 있도록 해줄게요.
first_translate: I’ll help you get back to heylon faster.
second_translate: I'll help you return to Heylon faster.
label: I'll try to get you back to heylon as soon as possible.
thank you!
you know...

first_translate: I know you have a reason to hurry,
second_translate: Even if you have a reason to hurry,
label: even if you have a reason to rush,

hangle: 숲에 번개를 난사하면 아군이 겁을 먹는단 말이다.
first_translate: but if you fire lightning all over the forest, you’ll scare our allies.
second_translate: If you keep firing lightning all over the forest, you'll end up scaring our allies.
label: you just ended up scaring our men when you shot lightning at them to get them to hurry.
ahaha...

first_translate: but it helped us finish early.
second_translate: But thanks to that, we finished early.
label: well, it got the job done quickly, didn’t it?
oh,
lady eunice!
lady fiona!

hangle: 영애의 힘으로 이 죽은 땅을 복구시킬 수 있을 것 같나요?
first_translate: do you think you can restore this dead land with your power?
second_translate: Do you think you can restore this dead land with your power, my lady?
label: do you think you could use your powers to revive the dead lands?

first_translate: I think I can do some of it,
second_translate: I think some of it might be possible,
label: it would be possible to some extent,

hangle: 이렇게 넓은 범위의 죽은 땅은 저도 처음이라…
first_translate: but I’ve never seen such a large area of dead land before...
second_translate: But I've never encountered a dead land of this scale before...
label: but I've never seen such a vast area of dead lands before...

first_translate: it’s because my power is lacking.
second_translate: It's because my power is lacking.
label: it's my fault for not being strong enough.
lady eunice...
that's not true.

hangle: 성녀님은 한 분이고, 죽은 땅은 여러 개인데…
first_translate: there’s only one saint, but there are many dead lands...
second_translate: There's only one saint, but many dead lands...
label: this much dead land is impossible...

first_translate: it’s too much for you to handle alone.
second_translate: It's impossible to handle this alone from the start.
label: ...for one saint to take on.

hangle: 맞아요, 유니스 영애가 부족한 게 아니에요
first_translate: that’s right, it’s not because you’re lacking.
second_translate: That’s right, Lady Eunice, it’s not because you’re lacking.
label: that’s right. it's not your fault, lady eunice.

first_translate: don’t rush and take your time.
second_translate: Don't be impatient and take it step by step.
label: don't worry and try to take it one step at a time.

first_translate: yes, we’ll help you with anything.
second_translate: Yes, we’ll help too, with anything.
label: yes, we'll do whatever we can to help.

hangle: 어려운 부분이 있으면 혼자 앓지 말아요, 영애.
first_translate: if you’re having a hard time, don’t suffer alone, my lady.
second_translate: If you're struggling, don't suffer alone, my lady.
label: if you have any problems, please let us know, my lady.
thank you...

second_translate: Everyone is cheering me on like this,
label: with everyone rooting for me,

hangle: 혼자 약한 소리를 할 수는 없어.
first_translate: so I can’t be the only one feeling weak.
second_translate: I can't show weakness on my own.
label: I can’t call myself weak.
I'm sorry for making you worry.
I'll try to stay strong...!
wow, that's the spirit.

hangle: 이러다가 너무 금방 끝내버리는 건 아닌지 몰라.
first_translate: we might finish this too quickly.
second_translate: We might end up finishing this too quickly.
label: at this rate, I think we might get this over with sooner than later.
oh, I don't know about that...
I was kidding.
